original: Hañci iṭṭhaphalaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci iṭṭha phala no ca vata re vattabbe
saddhā iṭṭha phalā saddhā cetasikā ati
paññā iṭṭha phalā paññā cetasikā ati
saddhā iṭṭha phalā saddhā acetasikā ati
paññā iṭṭha phalā paññā acetasikā ati
nanu sa phalam sa vipākam ti

original: Hañci saphalaṁ savipākaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sa phalam sa vipāka no ca vata re vattabbe
phoṭṭhabba āyatanam acetasikam a vipākam ti
cakkhu āyatanam acetasikam sa vipākam ti
sīle uppajjitvā niruddhe dussīlaḥ hoti iti
